activities:
Full Circle Studies, Inc. compiles usage information from webpages that choose to include Full Circle Studies tags. The collected information is used to supplement research reports on Internet trends and e-commerce activities. Full Circle Studies makes commercially easonable efforts to prevent the transmission to the United States of personally identifiable information (PII) from European internet users
who have visited participating webpages. Full Circle Studies also collects survey data, which may be completed by European users. This survey data may include the IP address of the user.
corpofftitle1: Chief Privacy Officer, Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Full Circle Studies, Inc. is committed to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)) or their authorized representatives.
